sourcesContent: export const email = value => value && !/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value) ? Invalid email address! : undefined export const required = value => { if (value) return undefined return Please, fill in the field! } export const password = value => value && value === [] ? Password should contain at least 6 symbols! : undefined
